1.1.4.name: wordpress/dt-author-box
1.1.4.description:
DT Author Box is great for those who have multiple authors on a Wordpress site and want to show author information at the bottom of every post for each author like a signature. This can include an image, a short bio, a link to the author's website and the author's Twitter. Each author can upload their own avatar profile image directly, provide a bio, add their Twitter profile and website url under their profile.

Added Language Support

  • German
  • Spanish
  • French
  • Indonesian
  • Italian - Thanks to Marco Pegoraro for accurate translation
  • Portuguese

Language translation may not be exact, Google Translate was used. If you find any errors, please let me know.

Upcoming Features

  • add author box to pages
  • change color of author box background
  • change color of borders
  • change color of text
  • change color of links
